scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && node src/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && node src/index.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.test.prisma && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js
